title: Divya Ratna Haaram Set - Exquisite Diamond and Gemstone Necklace with Jhumka Earrings
materials: South Sea Pearls. Features Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: Intricate floral designs adorned with meticulously set diamonds. The pendant features a teardrop-shaped emerald at its center, surrounded by a halo of diamonds and cascading South Sea Pearls. The matching Jhumka earrings echo the necklace's floral motif and pearl detailing. The necklace is articulated for comfortable wear and a flattering drape. Floral design, diamond setting, south sea pearls.
colors: accented by the vibrant green of the emerald
red ruby and the creamy luster of the South Sea Pearls.
occasions: and other special occasions where you want to make a statement. The set can be adapted for engagement ceremonies and other festive gatherings.
description: This Divya Ratna Haaram Set is a testament to the skill of South Indian artisans. The brilliant diamonds, vibrant gemstones, and lustrous pearls create a luxurious and unforgettable look. The combination of traditional design and modern elegance makes this set a timeless investment, showcasing the essence of Telugu heritage.
